name: GGJ23 Root Directory
description:
You play as a Virus that has infiltrated a poor nobody's PC and taken control of their mouse cursor, You're job is to make your way to the ROOT directory of the computer so you can wreck their machine. Be careful though, This individual dosen't mess around and has some pretty heavy-duty anti-virus software... Windows Defender. 

Controls:

Left Mouse Click = Normal Attack

Right Mouse Click = Heavy Attack

Ctrl + Z = Undo last bit of damage taken 

Credits

Josh Davidson & Luke Shingleton
